name: mimeo-example-server
description: Use mimeo on server to render static html pages

scripts.server:start: [ -f server.pid ] && exit; node server/api.js &>server.log & echo $! > server.pid
scripts.server:stop: [ ! -f server.pid ] && exit; kill $(cat server.pid) && rm server.pid && rm server.log
scripts.server:restart: npm run server:stop; npm run server:start

author: Thomas Rubbert
